With the outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic in Europe in early 2020, the focus changed entirely from solving the European en-route capacity crisis to managing an unprecedented global crisis of the aviation industry affecting the entire value chain. 

Complementary to the [EUROCONTROL web page][ectlweb], the goal of this page is to support the industry and interested parties with a consolidated view of relevant information on the impact of the COVID-19 crisis on the aviation industry, particularly related to performance topics.
